column4: Members of the 'Sustainability Trust' are badmouthing the government on the internet

column6: The Senior Rights Society have been sending large petitions to government, criticizing your current policies.

column6: Marxism Now is actively urging it's members to take non-violent action against government policies.

column6: The Campaign For Family Values says it will oppose government policy by all means at it's disposal.

column6: Defenders Of The Flag has refused to rule out direct physical action against the current government.

column6: The Federation of Entrepreneurs has warned that it will not stand by and allow the government to wreck the business community any longer.

column4: Intelligence services report growing concern about a relatively small extremist religious organization known as the 'Angels of Heavenly Justice'. We should keep a close eye on their activities.
column5: Our intelligence services report serious concerns about the actions of the extremist religious groups who go by the name 'Angels of Heavenly Justice'. There is a moderate threat of violent attacks from this group in the near future.
column6: Our intelligence experts express concern about a large and credible threat from the 'Angels of Heavenly Justice', the extremist religious organization which has been making a high number of specific threats against the government.

column4: Our security services are concerned about strong support for the extremist human-rights campaigning group known as the 'Freedom Rebellion'. This group may present a serious threat in the future.
column5: Our security experts are warning us about the growing capabilities and strengths of the extremist group known as the 'Freedom Rebellion'. This group has both the motivation and personnel to carry out serious attacks against our government.
column6: Our Intel experts are concerned about imminent attacks on government by the popular and dangerous extremist group calling themselves the 'Freedom Rebellion'. We need to be on high alert.

column4: We are monitoring extensive extremist communication amongst a group of communist activists calling themselves the 'Peoples Brigade'. We need to keep an eye on this group.
column5: The hard-left extremist group known as the 'Peoples Brigade' are growing in strength and may represent a serious threat to our government in the medium term.
column6: There is a very real danger of attack on government institutions by the hard-left extremist group called the 'Peoples Brigade'. This group is large, motivated and well equipped.

column4: Our security experts report that they have monitored communications between members of what appears to be an extremist conservative group called the 'Traditional Values Regiment', which draws on support from conservative voters.
column5: Our Intel experts are showing increased concern about the capabilities and motivations of the conservative terror group known as the 'Traditional Values Regiment'. This group should be considered an active threat.
column6: Our security personnel are showing urgent concern about the capabilities and motivations of the conservative terror group known as the 'Traditional Values Regiment'. This group should be considered a  real and present danger.

column5: Security experts are concerned that the Green terror group known as the 'Avengers Of Mother Earth' are growing in ambition and capability, and are a threat to be taken very seriously.
column6: Our intelligence experts are highly concerned about the threat to government and your person by the extremist green terrorist cell called the 'Avengers Of Mother Earth'.

column4: The security services have detected a growth in support for extremist patriotic organizations and have concerns about a group called the 'True Patriots'.
column5: Our security forces have intercepted evidence suggesting that the patriotic terrorist group 'True Patriots' represents a genuine threat which needs to be monitored closely.
column6: We have evidence that the extremist terror group 'True Patriots' has the manpower and capability to pose a genuine threat to our government. We need to be on high alert.

column4: Our security services are concerned that there are extremist elements within ethnic minorities that are calling themselves the 'Multicultural Warriors', which may become a serious threat to law and order.
column5: We have evidence of a real threat from the extremist ethnic terror group known as the 'Multicultural Warriors'. This group is now being actively monitored in case they attempt violent action.
column6: Our security personnel have serious concerns about a real terror threat to us from the organization calling themselves the 'Multicultural Warriors'. Everyone is on high alert for an attack.

column4: Our security experts are concerned about a potential security threat from an extremely well funded shadowy organization comprised of various wealthy industrialists called  'The Invisible Hand'.
column5: Our intelligence experts have intercepted communications which suggests the pro-capitalist corporate-funded terror group known as  'The Invisible Hand' may be considering action against our government.
column6: Although we can't prove anything, our Intel experts are convinced that a serious terror threat from the mysterious  'Invisible Hand' is in fact being directly supported by wealthy and powerful corporations. The threat is acute.

column4: Our security staff are now routinely monitoring communications within a group of rural anti-government protesters known as the 'Provincial Defense Brigade' which is drawing support from farmers and other rural communities.
column5: Our intelligence staff report that there are genuine concerns about terrorist action from the rural pressure group / terrorist group calling themselves the 'Provincial Defense Brigade'.
column6: There is now ample evidence that the rural terror group 'Provincial Defense Brigade' made up mostly of disgruntled farmers, has the capability and manpower to carry out a serious terrorist strike against our government.
